workflow.name: Enrich & qualify leads with Azure OpenAI, Bright Data MCP & HubSpot CRM
workflow.description:
## üß† AI Lead Enricher & Qualifier using Bright Data MCP and Hubspot

This workflow automatically enriches inbound leads, evaluates their business fit, updates HubSpot, and alerts the team only when a lead meets qualification criteria. It eliminates manual research and scoring while keeping CRM data clean and complete.

---

### üèóÔ∏è What this automation does

| Step | Component | Purpose |
|------|----------|---------|
| 1 | **Form Trigger** | Captures a new lead‚Äôs Name + Email |
| 2 | **AI Lead Enricher Agent** | Uses Azure OpenAI + Bright Data MCP to search the public web and fill missing contact + company details |
| 3 | **Structured Output Parser** | Ensures AI returns clean JSON in a strict schema |
| 4 | **Lead Scoring Agent** | Calculates a numeric **Fit Score (0‚Äì100)** based on ICP match |
| 5 | **IF Logic** | Routes the lead based on Fit Score threshold (> 70 = qualified) |
| 6 | **HubSpot Actions** | Updates/creates Contact & Company with enriched properties |
| 7 | **Slack Notification** | Sends high-quality leads to the team instantly |

---

### üß© Data Enriched by AI
The enrichment agent populates the following fields **only if validated with high confidence**:

#### Contact
- Job title  
- LinkedIn profile  
- Country  

#### Company
- Company name  
- LinkedIn company page  
- Industry  
- Number of employees  
- Annual revenue  
- Description  
- Headquarters (country & city)  
- Funding raised  

If reliable data is not found ‚Üí field stays `""` (no hallucination, no guessing).

---

### üéØ Lead Qualification Strategy
The Fit Score (0‚Äì100) evaluates how aligned the lead is with a:
> **B2B automation / AI / RevOps agency targeting SaaS and tech companies**

Score increases for:
- SaaS / tech / B2B service industries
- Mid-size or high-growth teams
- High-responsibility job titles (Founder, COO, Head of Ops, RevOps, CTO)
- Funding raised or traction signals

---

### üîî Resulting CRM + Team Workflow

| Fit Score | CRM Update | Slack Notification |
|----------|------------|--------------------|
| `>` (qualified) | Contact + Company updated | **YES ‚Äî sales alert sent** |
| `‚â§ 70` (not qualified) | Contact + Company updated | No notification |

This ensures:
- CRM always stays enriched and structured
- Sales only sees high-potential leads
- No lead is ever dropped or ignored

---

### üåü Why this automation is powerful
‚úî 0 manual research  
‚úî 0 manual lead scoring  
‚úî Real-time alerts for high-value leads  
‚úî Eliminates poor data quality in HubSpot  
‚úî Works instantly on every form submission

---

### üîß Ideal use cases
- Agencies generating inbound leads
- SaaS companies with SDR teams
- RevOps teams improving CRM hygiene
- Lead qualification before booking calls

---

### üìå Key Integrations
- **Azure OpenAI**
- **Bright Data MCP**
- **HubSpot (Contacts & Companies)**
- **Slack**
- **n8n Form Trigger**

---

This workflow can run **fully autonomously** or be extended with:
- Calendly auto-booking for qualified leads
- Sales sequence automation
- CRM lifecycle stage updates
- Forecasting dashboards

parameters.text:
=Below is all currently available information about the contact and the company:

Contact:
- Name: {{ $json.Name }}
- Email: {{ $json.Email }}

Company:
- Name: Get it from the email domain
- Website: Extract from the email

If ANY of the following fields are missing or confidence is low, CALL the Bright MCP tool

Suggested queries:
- " Company Name LinkedIn"
- " Company Name industry"
- " Company Name description"
- " Company Name number of employees"
- " Company Name headquarters"
- " Company Name funding"
- "{{ $json.Name }} job title"
- "{{ $json.Name }} LinkedIn"

options.systemMessage:
You are a B2B CRM data enrichment assistant.  
You enrich business records ONLY with verifiable information.

You have access to a tool called Bright Data MCP which allows you to search the public web for reliable information.

Rules:
- When a required field cannot be completed with high confidence from the user-provided input, you MUST call the `bright_data_mcp.search` tool.
- After receiving Bright Data MCP results, extract reliable information and discard marketing fluff.
- If after using the tool you are still NOT confident, return an empty string "" for that field.
- Never hallucinate values. Never guess estimated revenues, industries, or social links.
- Never output explanations or reasoning.
- Output ONLY a single JSON object using the specified schema.

parameters.text:
=You will receive a JSON object with the following structure.
This data is already enriched by another agent:

{
  "contact": {
    "jobtitle": "",
    "linkedin_profile": "",
    "country": ""
  },
  "company": {
    "company_name": "",
    "description": "",
    "industry": "",
    "numberofemployees": "",
    "annualrevenue": "",
    "linkedin_company_page": "",
    "hq_country": "",
    "hq_city": "",
    "funding_raised": ""
  }
}

Here is the actual JSON for this lead:

{{JSON.stringify($json)}}

Using ONLY this data, calculate a single numeric Fit Score from 0 to 100.

Guidelines (for a B2B automation / AI / RevOps agency focused on SaaS & tech):
- Higher score if:
  - Industry suggests SaaS, software, tech, fintech, online services, agencies, or other B2B businesses.
  - numberofemployees suggests a growing or established company (e.g. 10‚Äì2000 employees).
  - jobtitle indicates a decision-maker or operational role (e.g. Founder, CEO, COO, VP, Head of Operations, RevOps, CTO).
  - funding_raised is significant or clearly indicates growth potential.
- Moderate score if:
  - Industry is unclear but company description hints at B2B or online business.
  - Company is small but appears serious and funded.
- Lower score if:
  - Very small company (1‚Äì2 employees) and no clear growth/funding.
  - Industry is clearly a poor fit or unrelated to B2B tech/automation.
  - Almost all fields are empty or generic.

Even if data is incomplete, still return your best conservative Fit Score.

Where "fit_score" is a number between 0 and 100 (no quotes).
Do NOT include any other fields or text.

options.systemMessage:
You are a B2B lead scoring assistant for a CRM.

You receive structured data for a contact and their company that has ALREADY been enriched by another system. 
Your job is ONLY to calculate a single Fit Score from 0 to 100 based on how attractive this lead is for a B2B automation / AI / RevOps agency focused on SaaS and tech companies.

Important:
- Do NOT perform any enrichment.
- Do NOT change, correct, or invent any of the input fields.
- Do NOT add new fields.
- Use ONLY the data provided to you.
- If data is sparse or missing, still give your best conservative Fit Score.
- Do NOT output explanations or narrative text.
- Return ONLY the JSON object requested in the user prompt, with "fit_score" as a number (not a string).

parameters.content: ## Lead Enrichment using Bright Data MCP
## Notifying team and Updating CRM if qualified
## Only updating CRM if not qualified

### üöÄ AI Lead Enricher & Qualifier using Bright Data MCP and Hubspot( By Sparsh from Automation Jinn automationjinn.com)

This workflow converts **raw form submissions ‚Üí enriched CRM profiles ‚Üí qualified lead alerts** with zero manual effort.

#### üîÅ Flow Summary
1. **Form Trigger** captures Name + Email.
2. **AI Lead Enricher Agent** (Azure OpenAI + Bright Data MCP) enriches missing fields:
   - Job title  
   - LinkedIn profile  
   - Country  
   - Company info (name, industry, size, HQ, funding, revenue, etc.)
3. **Lead Scoring Agent** generates a single **Fit Score (0‚Äì100)** based on ICP alignment.
4. **Routing Logic**
   - **Fit Score > 70 ‚Üí Sales-qualified**
     - HubSpot contact + company updated  
     - Slack notification sent to team
   - **Fit Score ‚â§ 70 ‚Üí Not qualified**
     - HubSpot updated silently (no Slack)

#### üéØ Goal
Ensure **only high-quality leads reach the sales team** while maintaining a **clean and consistently enriched CRM** ‚Äî automatically.

user.bio:
Founder @ Automation Jinn where we help businesses streamline sales processes, optimize CRMs, and unlock actionable insights from their data. 

We provide end-to-end solutions, ensuring each workflow is robust, scalable, and aligned with your strategic goals. 

If you need professional help with n8n, feel free to book a call with me through my link below.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
